comment._content: Two people, not one.  Glyn & Whitman, 1/1/15, according to the title.

comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: "Whitman" is Charles Seymour Whitman. "Glynn" is Martin Glynn, his predecessor as Governor of New York.
